channel.title: Unable to drag Comment objects
channel.description:
NOTE: this is with the Experimental branch
It's not possible (or at least extremely difficult) to drag and move Comment objects with the mouse.
Build: 1.0.12-1-432 on Ubuntu 16.04
PS: I can't cut and paste the build number from the about dialog - if that text was copyable it would make bug reporting easier.

item.title: Unable to drag Comment objects
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

Experimental is a development branch and is not released yet, please raise issues on GitHub as bugs etc, rather than on the forum.

Read full topic
